Privacy Policy

Effective Date:01/01/2021

This website URL is http://assethomez.com/, which is a copyrighted work belonging to Asset Homez. Certain features of the Site may be subject to additional guidelines, terms, and conditions, which will be posted on the Site in connection with such features.

All such additional terms, guidelines, and conditions are incorporated by reference into this policy. This Privacy Policy, we described the legally binding Privacy Policy that oversees your use of the Site. By logging into the Site, you are compliant that these terms and you represent that you have the authority and capacity to enter into these Terms. You should be at least 18 years of age to access the site, nevertheless with parents probation. If you disagree with all of the provisions of these terms, do not log into and/or use the site.

The Privacy Policy of logging in has been compiled to serve you better. This is to comply with those who are concerned with how their ‘Personally Identifiable Information’ (PII) is being used online. PII, as identifies a specific individual, includes vital data such as a name, mailing address, contact details such as mobile number, email address number and other specific information.
Please read carefully to protect further or otherwise handle your Personally Identifiable Information in accordance with our Site.
What personal information do we collect from the people that visit our blog, website or app?
When registering on our site, you may be asked to enter your name, email address, phone number or other details to help you with your experience. We never ask for credit card numbers and any security information.

When do we collect information?
We gather information once you register on our site, subscribe to a newsletter, use live chat and fill out a form or enter information on our site.

How do we use your information?
We may use the information we collect from you when you register, sign up for our newsletter, respond to a survey or marketing communication, surf the website, or use certain other site features in the following ways: To deliver a quick response in your queries through live chat, email, social media, and phone inquiries.Terms Conditions

Terms of Use
Asset Homez’s Website provides the www.assethomez.com www.assethomez.com domain and related services to you, subject to the following terms and conditions of use (“Terms and Conditions”) contained herein on this webpage, shall govern, apply the full force and effect of your usage, including all pages within this Website. Please read the Terms and Conditions carefully before accessing or using and take action to this Website

Privacy
Please review our Privacy Policy, which governs the protection and use of any personal information you may provide to us upon filling in our forms.

Copyright
All content on this Website, including sales listings, text, graphics, photographs, logos, images, audio clips, video clips, digital downloads, and data compilations is the property of Asset Homez Website or its third party content suppliers and licensors and is protected by copyright laws. All software or software suppliers used on this site are protected by copyright laws.

Trademarks
The name Asset Homez and its related logos are registered trademarks of Asset Homez. They may not be used in conjunction with any product or service which is not offered by Asset Homez, is likely to cause confusion among clients, or in any manner that denounces or discredits Asset Homez. Any other trademarks not owned by Asset Homez that appear on this Website are the property of their respective owners, who may or may not be affiliated with, connected to, or sponsored by Asset Homez.

Scope of Use and Content
This Website and its Content, including the property listings and advertisements, management and agent profiles, property management and other services that Asset Homez is providing is solely intended to assist individual clients. For property listing, you may not contact a Listings’ owner directly. You may not sell, copy, distribute, license, transfer, publish, display, link to another website, transmit, download, store, post, enter into a database or in any way exploit the Content, including the Listings, in whole or in part. No person, including without limitation any real estate broker or real estate professional, may market or make commercial use of Asset Homez’s Listings or Content in any way, including without limitation, advertising, copying Asset Homez’s Listings or Content for its own commercial use or use on other websites or in marketing materials, or contacting directly Asset Homez’s clients or Listings’ owners. Any real estate broker who uses an individual Listing for its client must first enter into a Co-Brokerage Agreement or Referral Agreement with Asset Homez.

No Warranties
This Website is provided to Users on an “as is”, “as available”, and “believed accurate” with all faults and Asset Homez makes no express or implied representations and warranties, of any kind related to this Website or the materials contained on this Website. All information is subject to errors, or change or withdrawal without notice.
Asset Homez does not warrant or make representations regarding the results that may be obtained by using the Website or as to the reliability, accuracy or currency of any information, content or service acquired by use of the Website. Any property Listings may be withdrawn from the market at any time and are subject to errors, omissions, and prior sale or rent without notice. Asset Homez does not warrant that the Website, its servers, or e-mail sent by Asset Homez is free of viruses or other harmful components. Content may be updated, changed, modified, or withdrawn at any time.
Use of the Website and the Content is at your sole risk. None ofAsset Homez, the Content providers, or any person involved in the creation, production, distribution of this Website warrant that the functions contained in this Website will be uninterrupted or error-free, that defects will be corrected, or that the server that makes the Content available will be free of viruses or other harmful components.

Limitation of Liability
None of Asset Homez’s directors, officers, employees, affiliates, and agents, shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or special damages arising out of or in any way connected with access to or use of the Website or the Listings, even if Asset Homez has been advised of the possibility of such damages.

Indemnification
You hereby indemnify to the fullest extent, Asset Homez’s directors, officers, employees, affiliates, and agents, from and against any all liabilities, demands, cause of action, against all losses, expenses, damages, and costs including reasonable attorneys’ fees, resulting from your violation of these Terms and Conditions.

Third-Party Rights
These Terms and Conditions are for the sole benefit of Asset Homez, its directors, officers, employees, affiliates, and agents, No other person, including any user of the Website, shall have the right to assert a claim under these Terms and Conditions.

Modifications to Terms of Use and Content
Asset Homez reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to modify, alter or otherwise update these Terms and Conditions at any time. By using this Website after Asset Homez has posted notice of such modifications, alterations or updates, you agree to be bound by such revised Terms and Conditions. In addition, Asset Homez reserves the right to make improvements and/or changes in the Content of the Website at any time.

Violations of Terms and Conditions of Use
Asset Homez reserves the right to seek all remedies and solutions available and possible at law and in equity for violations of the Terms and Conditions set forth in the Website, including the right to block access from a particular Internet address to the Website.
